name: Ludum Dare: The Game (Maître Pantoufle)
description:
You are about to participate in The Ludum Dare #43 !

The theme of this edition is "Sacrifices must be made".

As you think about this theme, a few great ideas appear in your mind.
But you know that you have only 48H to create your game !

You need to choose carefully which features you will take the time to implement.

Sacrifices must be made.

This game was made for the #LudumDare43

I made everything that is in the game in 48h
